idea:
Filmboard is a unique and a pioneering, omni-channel/online B2B marketplace for production services where buyers (producers/filmmakers) can book ANY film related requirement in India powered by the first ever verified, rated and reviewed database that is already the largest in India. Filmboard will disrupt the B2B space of the entertainment industry in the area of creation of content. It will change the game in creation of content at every stage leading to much needed cost efficiencies, reduction of project delays, and cutting down entry barriers.

Filmboard Movies Website
name: Filmboard Movies Private Limited
